title: Software Intern
purpose: To integrate and showcase RAN and AI workload orchestration in a cloud native environment
duties_responsibilities: Work with Aerial engineering and arch team to integrate and orchestrate RAN and AI workloads on RAN infrastructure
Implement the demo plan to showcase the advanced RAN and AI use scenarios
Utilize strong analytical and problem-solving skills
required_qualifications: Pursuing a BS/MS in Computer Science, or related field (or equivalent experience)
Strong understanding of Kubernetes and container technology
Strong programming skills in Python and familiarity with C/C++ development
User space development and debugging expertise in Linux environment
Basic understanding of ML/DL training and inferencing concepts
Ability to manage time in a fast, heavily multitasked environment

company_info.overview: Designer & manufacturer of computer chips & graphics processors
company_info.mission: To solve the world's most stimulating technology problems
